tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.carHigh:
Previously played on Latinoamérica, eGolf Tour and Adams Tour.

2014: Finished 147th at the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.

2013: As a member of Latinoamérica, played in 14 events, making four cuts. Best finish was T31 in Aberto de Brasil.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won seven collegiate tournaments at St. Mary's...Won five tournaments in high school.
tourBios.personal: Attended Ronald Reagan High School in San Antonio, Texas...Non golf-related jobs included babysitting and caddying. Says if he weren't a professional golfer, would most like to be a VIP Host. Favorite college team is the University of Texas and favorite professional teams are the San Antonio Spurs and Green Bay Packers. Is involved with Habitat for Humanity. In addition to English, speaks, Korean, Polish and Spanish.
